nodes.text: Garvan Spasso was a criminal trader on the planet Kalab.

Garvan Spasso was the partner of Borke Valkanhayn. But after a piece of trouble, Valkanhayn was forced to flee to Glova where he continued his business with Spasso. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, Garvan Spasso hired a group of smugglers to carry some spices and holotapes to Borke Valkanhayn on Glova.
